front.title: Telephony-Return Interface (TRI) Management Information Base for DOCSIS-compliant Telephony-Return Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it defines a basic set of managed objects for SNMP-based management of DOCSIS compliant Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMIv2[5][6][7]. The set of objects is consistent with the SNMP framework and existing SNMP standards. This memo is a product of the IPCDN working group.
